product_name: Icelandic Dreams
‘Chasing Awe With Gavin Hardcastle’ – Photography Ebook

Category: Photography Workshops, Photo Tours and Private Tuition
Join me, Gavin Hardcastle on my photography workshops and photo tours. We'll visit some of planet earths most spectacular locations. Take your photography skills to the next level. Learn everything from composition to image post processing. I'll also teach you specific shooting techniques like focus stacking with dead zones, night photography, sunrises and sunsets.
